channel.title: Trouble Port-Forwarding (PLEASE REMOVE)
channel.description:
!PLEASE REMOVE! I GOT IT WORKING~!~ (I had the 192.168.1.1 and 192.168.1.11 switched around and I got it working)
I am having some trouble port-forwarding. I have already gone through the process of NO-IP and everything but this is the problem I am encountering. Whenever I try to sign into my server from my client it says "Error connecting to server." so I checked my port on Canyouseeme.org but I got an error saying "Connection Refused."
All the information I can give you: [img]http://i1295.photobucket.com/albums/b622/im4ever12c/helpme2_zps03d0657c.png[/img]
[img]http://i1295.photobucket.com/albums/b622/im4ever12c/helpme_zps5da8ca94.png[/img]
[img]http://i1295.photobucket.com/albums/b622/im4ever12c/helpme3_zpsc9f103ab.png[/img]
Can anyone help me? Thanks~!~
